references.paper_title: Fourier Neural Operator for Parametric Partial Differential Equations
references.reason: This paper introduces the Fourier Neural Operator (FNO), a key component of the proposed FUSE framework, demonstrating its effectiveness in solving parametric PDEs.

references.paper_title: Glow: Generative Flow with Invertible 1x1 Convolutions
references.reason: This paper introduces Glow, a generative flow model used in the FUSE framework for efficient and accurate parameter inference, particularly effective in handling complex probability distributions.
This paper provides the reduced order model for blood flow used as a test case in the experiments, showcasing the practical application of the FUSE methodology in a complex cardiovascular system.

references.paper_title: Numerical solutions of a non-linear density current: A benchmark solution and comparisons
references.reason: This paper introduces the atmospheric cold bubble test case, another critical application used to demonstrate the capabilities of the FUSE framework in handling atmospheric modeling challenges.
This paper introduces RealNVP, a key component for the FMPE model used for parameter inference within the FUSE framework, illustrating the method's potential for high-dimensional data.
